object.property: Sets if the folder should be used as read-only, or writable also.
If enabled, the disk image will be 'grown' when more space is needed. Otherwise, the given size is allocated at creation time.
Registers a cd or a dvd image (.iso) so that VirtualBox can use it.
Registers a cd or a dvd image (.iso) so that VirtualBox can use it.
If enabled, the VM will have direct access to the dvd device (necessary for writing)
